title: Implement collapsing margins through an entire box
body: This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/simonsapin/victor/29)

title: Track generated boxes in the DOM
body:
Boxes on the box tree are reference-counted with `Arc`. Boxes generated by a DOM element (including through pseudo-elements) have a second strong reference kept in that element in the DOM tree.

This is one of the pieces needed to later add incremental box construction and, after the fragment tree is similarly reference-counted, incremental layout as well as layout queries from script.

title: Implement margin collapsing between siblings and with parent
Layout a BFC sequentially when it contains floats
Properly propagate tree rank for abspos elements
Add support for block-level independent formatting contexts
Finish box constrution for pseudo-elements and replaced content
Floats and abspos can contain any kind of formatting context
body: (Even though there’s only one kind implemented for now.)

title: Create float boxes
body: Those boxes are not rendered yet.

title: Add victor to default members of the workspace
Add line breaking on ASCII whitespace
Implement absolute positioning
body:
Shrink-to-fit size is missing, absolute positioning in inline formatting contexts is
missing. There are probably off-by-some-amount-of-pixels bugs lying around.

title: Do tree construction in two phases
body:
First phase builds the block-level boxes on the root element,
then we traverse the resulting intermediate boxes to handle
nested block-level boxes and text shaping.
